portrait_l.name: player
portrait_l.sjis: アニキにたのまれた荷物を とどけなきゃ
portrait_l.ascii: I have to deliver these goods

portrait_l.sjis: 外に行く必要は特にないか
portrait_l.ascii: I don't need to do anything outside

portrait_l.sjis: あの像もみあきたなぁ
